1550331862_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body:
using USB is a bad idea. It's not meant for storage like this and it's very easy to corrupt your entire setup.
get a used NAS instead to fill with HDDs.
or build your own from an old computer with linux and ZFS.
make your own NAS then with linux and ZFS and all the USB drives attached. It will be the safest option as ZFS will scrub all the errors away.

1619207712_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnX.body:
You can do a large number of things.

Some platforms like Twitter and Instagram require some form of validation, hence asking people to contact you there cuts out the bot spam.

You can also set up a linktr.ee page with links to various places you can be reached, and let people choose what they find convenient.

Finally there's plenty of temporary email services, like airmail, guerillamail, getnada, etc. but you have to remember to check them and clean them up periodically if they get personal messages for you.

In the end it's just as easy to create a general spam email every year or so with which you sign up for things and interact with strangers, keeping your personal email for family and friends. You can also forward all these spam emails to your personal inbox (and unforward when you want to) so you only have one place to check.

Have fun, be safe.
